skills.skill: Software Proficiency (Excel, Visio, Word, and PowerPoint)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the team with assigned tasks, projects, and correspondence, and track project deliverables and deadlines.
Maintain accurate and complete files for projects and programs, and update systems to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
Interact with external stakeholders, create and distribute relevant correspondence and reports.
Assist with administrative preparation and coordination for meetings and events.
Prepare and submit purchase orders, process contractor invoices, and handle various office management functions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Associate degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
